content: page 2 new year s mittens designed by barbara french ©2012 make the thumb return sts on thread holder to dpns and distribute as follows 3 3 3 4 4 3 re-attach yarn and begin knitting at bottom right corner of thumb hole k around and with needle 3 pick up and knit one st across gap at top of thumb hole you will have 10 12 sts continue to work the thumb in st st until it measures approx 2 2 ½ or till it just reaches the top of your thumb decrease the top as follows k2tog around break off yarn leaving appprox 6 length and draw through rem 5 6 sts pull up snugly thread yarn to inside finishing turn mitten inside out secure all loose ends and weave them in use the yarn tail at the base of the thumb to close up any gaps it is common to have gaps at the base of the thumb glossary of stitches m1 an increase st with the left needle going enjoy your new mittens from front to back lift the bar between the sts then with the right needle knit into the back loop k2tog - a decrease st place right needle into 2 abbreviations sts at the same time and knit them together k - knit stockinette stitch when working in the round p - purl stockinet stitch is created by knitting every round st s - stitch es round s - round s dpn s - double pointed needles m1 make 1 k2tog - knit 2 together co cast on pm place marker sl m slip marker st st stockinette stitch rem remaining beg - beginning new year s mittens designed by barbara french ©2012 sizes s to fit hand size 6 ½ to 7 or m/l to fit hand size 7 ½ to 8 materials 100 gr bulky yarn pictured is bulky organic wool hand-dyed exclusively for the yarn shop double pointed needles dpns sizes us7 and us9 gauge 4 sts/in on us9 needles notes check abbreviations for unfamiliar terms instructions quick & easy knit the cuff with us7 dpns cast on 30 33 sts distribute sts on needles as follows 9 12 9 12 9 12 work 11 sts between markers in k2 p1 ribbing for approx 3 next round k1 remove marker place next 9 11 sts on a string holder remove marker co 1 st with begin the hand backward loop method continue knitting to end of round with us9 dpns continue in stockinette stitch knit every round and decrease 2 1 st s on the first round you will have 28 32 sts knit 8 rnds continue the hand and shape the top k till work measures approx 9 10 from beg begin the thumb gusset or till just past the last joint of the middle finger decrease the top as follows round 1 k1 place marker on right needle pm m1 round 1 k2 k2tog around see glossary k1
